channel.title: Comments on: Identify procedures that call SQL Server undocumented procedures
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jeff Moden
item.dc:creator: Jeff Moden
item.content:encoded:
“What will you use instead of xp_fixeddrives ? “

Use xp_CmdShell to call Powershell to call WMI. ;-0

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: What will you use instead of xp_fixeddrives ?
item.content:encoded: What will you use instead of xp_fixeddrives ?

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.content:encoded:
Check this article Undocumented stored procedures on the same topic.

You can also run sp_help on master database to find lots of undocumented functions and procedures

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: But it's deprecated, as I understood. In other words, even documented SPs may become deprecated.
item.content:encoded: But it’s deprecated, as I understood. In other words, even documented SPs may become deprecated.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Naomi,

sp_makewebtask is in books on line

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa238843%28SQL.80%29.aspx

as well as sp_runwebtask

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Okay after this I WILL stop, 9 more

xp_get_MAPI_default_profile
xp_get_MAPI_profiles

xp_regdeletekey
xp_regdeletevalue
xp_regread
xp_regenumvalues
xp_regaddmultistring
xp_regremovemultistring
xp_regwrite

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
and just because I can ðŸ™‚ here are 5 more

sp_MSuniqueobjectname
sp_MSuniquecolname
sp_MSuniquename
sp_MSunc_to_drive
